mapper.select: select f.favorite_no, e.event_no, e.performance_type, e.title, e.place, e.event_period, e.img, NVL(AVG(er.rating), 0) as rating from favorite f join event e on f.event_no = e.event_no left join event_review er on e.event_no = er.event_no where f.user_no = #{user_no} group by f.favorite_no, e.event_no, e.performance_type, e.title, e.place, e.event_period, e.img
mapper.insert: insert into favorite (favorite_no, event_no, user_no) values (favorite_seq.nextval, #{event_no}, #{user_no})
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where favorite_no = #{favorite_no} and event_no = #{event_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: select avg(rating) from review where event_no = #{event_no}
